Sam Smith

About

Portfolio I

09 Nov 2018

This series of photographs represents approximately a years worth of work, starting in April 2016 when I got my Hasselblad. I chose to start then not because I feel that the change of camera increased the quality of images that I was producing but rather I wanted to keep the format consistent throughout. Also it was about a year after I started shooting film, and when I started pursuing photography as a hobby.

Under the Bridge

Ruined House

Llyn Cau

Mauerpark Karaoke

Wetzsteinhorn

Matterhorn

Rocks

Wye

Fire Exit

Bickenhill Plantation

Nyhavn

Tarn Hows Road

Between taking these photos at least a year and a half ago, compiling this series 6 months ago and now, my opinion of these images doesn’t seem to have changed too much. I think I can put this down to the memories I have attached to these photos and the fact that I didn’t take a whole lot else that was any good.
